title: NRSMCH Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for Data Entry Operator Posts
description: The Nil Ratan SircarÂ Medical College & Hospital (NRSMCH) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Data Entry Operator Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection ...
